Package net.skinsrestorer.api.storage

package net.skinsrestorer.api.storage
Contains all the storage-related classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.skinsrestorer.api
    SkinsRestorer API.
    net.skinsrestorer.api.connections
    Contains all the connection classes.
    net.skinsrestorer.api.event
    Contains all the events that are fired by the API.
    net.skinsrestorer.api.exception
     
    net.skinsrestorer.api.model
     
    net.skinsrestorer.api.property
    Contains classes related to skin properties and also the SkinApplier class to apply a property to a player.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    CacheStorage
    Caches Name -> UUID to avoid spamming Mojang's API and speed up skin fetching.
    PlayerStorage
    This interface is used to store and retrieve skin data for players.
    SkinStorage
    There are three types of skins: - Player skins - URL skins - Custom skins
    URL skins additionally store an "index"; an index is the skin variant that was generated by MineSkin.
